```{r}
library(stringr)

country <- vector()
city <- vector()

for(address in df[,1]){
  
  if(word(address,-1) == "Kingdom"){
    country <- c(country, paste(word(address, -2), word(address, -1), sep = " "))
    city <- c(city, word(address, -5))
  }
  else{
    country <- c(country, word(address, -1))
    city <- c(city, word(address, -2))  
  }
}

df['country'] <- country
df['city'] <- city

head(df)
```
